title: The Latest: Odom taken from Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
text: Former NBA Player Lamar Odom in Critical Condition 01:05 Lamar Odom, the former Los Angeles Laker and reality TV star, remains in critical condition in a Las Vegas hospital after being found unconscious in a legal brothel in Nevada on Tuesday. Sunrise Hospital has not released any information on Odomâ€™s condition, but TMZ reported early Wednesday that...
